name: Blood For the Blood God: A Dating Sim Demo
name_original: Blood For the Blood God: A Dating Sim Demo
description:
Warning! Explicit language

Blood for the Blood God is a Dating sim in development. Here is the official demo which will allow you to become familiar with the four bachelors who are available to be romanced or killed.
This is a short demo consisting of 10 different endings which can all be completed in roughly 45 minutes.

You are a servant created by the Blood God for the purpose of hunting down and killing three former servants, Beelzebabe, Lucifine, and Asstaroth, who have fled to Earth. But, taking them down will not be an easy task. You must earn their trust, their friendship...perhaps even their love. In the end, will you betray the man who created you? Betray the men who trust you? Who will you become?

Since this game is in very early stages please leave feedback so that we may enhance play experience in the future!
Thank you very much!

This demo also features alternate outfits that will only be available to kickstarter backers in the full game. To access these outfits simply open up the preferences screen and turn cosplay 'on.'

For more information please check out our website!
www.Bloodforthebloodgodblog.wordpress.com

We also have a prefundia page set up so you can preview potential reward tiers and leave feedback!
